:::

```{ojs}
//================== INPUT
import { html } from "@observablehq/stdlib";

// Inputs
viewof userRef = html`<input type="text" 
  class="form-control" 
  style="width: 150px;"
  value="ps40"/>`;
  
// VIEWOF
html`<div class="row container">
  Lookup&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  ${viewof userRef}
  ${userRef}
  </div>`  
  
```
